text: Joseph Silverstein (March 21, 1932 - November 22, 2015) was an American violinist and conductor. He was born in Detroit, Michigan. In 1962, Silverstein became concertmaster of the Boston Symphony Orchestra, a job he held for 22 years. He was appointed assistant conductor in 1971. He was music director of the Utah Symphony from 1983 to 1998. He has served as a professor of violin at the Curtis Institute of Music in Philadelphia.
